verses.text: Lord, how greatly \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* increased \w who|strong="H1121"\w* make attacks \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*! \w in|strong="H1121"\w* great numbers \w they|strong="H6440"\w* come \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

Unnumbered \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* say \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul, \w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* no \w help|strong="H6965"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. (Selah.)

\w But|strong="H0369"\w* \w your|strong="H0559"\w* \w strength|strong="H5315"\w*, \w O|strong="H5315"\w* Lord, \w is|strong="H0369"\w* round \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w you|strong="H5315"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H0559"\w* glory \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* lifter up \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H0559"\w* head.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* send \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cry \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* voice, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* gives \w me|strong="H7311"\w* \w an|strong="H7311"\w* answer \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* holy hill. (Selah.)

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* took \w my|strong="H3068"\w* rest \w in|strong="H0413"\w* sleep, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w then|strong="H6030"\w* again \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* awake; \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* support.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* no fear, \w though|strong="H3588"\w* ten thousand \w have|strong="H0589"\w* come round \w me|strong="H0589"\w*, putting themselves against \w me|strong="H0589"\w*.

Come \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, Lord; keep \w me|strong="H5921"\w* safe, O \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* given \w all|strong="H5439"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* haters blows \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* face-bones; \w the|strong="H0834"\w* teeth \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* evil-doers \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w been|strong="H0834"\w* broken \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*.

\w Salvation|strong="H3467"\w* comes \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*; \w your|strong="H3068"\w* blessing \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H7563"\w*. (Selah.)
